languages.text: "Я видела вас в деле и могу заверить, этот черный день никогда не настанет. Желаю быть вашим союзником, а не врагом, и надеюсь, это взаимно. Прощайте, Ваша Светлость!"
"I have seen you in action and I can assure you that black day will never come. I wish to be your ally, not your enemy, and I hope the feeling is mutual. Farewell, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
languages.original_text: "Я видела вас в деле и могу заверить, этот черный день никогда не настанет. Желаю быть вашим союзником, а не врагом, и надеюсь, это взаимно. Прощайте, Ваша Светлость!"

traits.locale_text: "I have seen you in action and I can assure you that black day will never come. I wish to be your ally, not your enemy, and I hope the feeling is mutual. Farewell, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
"I have seen you in action and I can assure you that black day will never come. I wish to be your ally, not your enemy, and I hope the feeling is mutual. Farewell, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
"I have seen you in action and I can assure you that black day will never come. I wish to be your ally, not your enemy, and I hope the feeling is mutual. Farewell, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
"I have seen you in action and I can assure you that black day will never come. I wish to be your ally, not your enemy, and I hope the feeling is mutual. Farewell, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
"I have seen you in action and I can assure you that black day will never come. I wish to be your ally, not your enemy, and I hope the feeling is mutual. Farewell, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
"I have seen you in action and I can assure you that black day will never come. I wish to be your ally, not your enemy, and I hope the feeling is mutual. Farewell, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

languages.text: "Ich habe Euch in Aktion erlebt und kann Euch versichern, dass dieser schwarze Tag niemals kommen wird. Ich möchte Eure Verbündete sein, nicht Eure Feindin, und hoffe, Euch geht es ebenso. Lebt wohl, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!"
languages.original_text: "I have seen you in action and I can assure you that black day will never come. I wish to be your ally, not your enemy, and I hope the feeling is mutual. Farewell, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euch in Aktion erlebt und kann Euch versichern, dass dieser schwarze Tag niemals kommen wird. Ich möchte Eure Verbündete sein, nicht Eure Feindin, und hoffe, Euch geht es ebenso. Lebt wohl, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!"

languages.text: « Je vous ai {mf|vu|vue} à l'œuvre et je peux vous assurer que ce jour fatidique n'arrivera pas. Je tiens à ce que nous soyons alliés, pas ennemis, et j'espère que c'est réciproque. Adieu, Votre Seigneurie ! »
languages.original_text: "I have seen you in action and I can assure you that black day will never come. I wish to be your ally, not your enemy, and I hope the feeling is mutual. Farewell, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous ai {mf|vu|vue} à l'œuvre et je peux vous assurer que ce jour fatidique n'arrivera pas. Je tiens à ce que nous soyons alliés, pas ennemis, et j'espère que c'est réciproque. Adieu, Votre Seigneurie ! »

languages.text: «Habiéndole visto en acción, puedo asegurarle que no llegará ese día aciago. Me gustaría ser su aliada, no su enemiga, y espero que el sentimiento sea mutuo. ¡Adiós, mi{mf|lord|lady}!».
languages.original_text: "I have seen you in action and I can assure you that black day will never come. I wish to be your ally, not your enemy, and I hope the feeling is mutual. Farewell, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: «Habiéndole visto en acción, puedo asegurarle que no llegará ese día aciago. Me gustaría ser su aliada, no su enemiga, y espero que el sentimiento sea mutuo. ¡Adiós, mi{mf|lord|lady}!».

languages.text: 「あなたのご活躍は見てきましたので、あのような暗黒の日は決して来ることがないと断言しましょう。私はあなたの敵ではなく、味方でありたい。そして、この思いはお互い共通のものだと思っています。それではまた、陛下」
languages.original_text: "I have seen you in action and I can assure you that black day will never come. I wish to be your ally, not your enemy, and I hope the feeling is mutual. Farewell, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのご活躍は見てきましたので、あのような暗黒の日は決して来ることがないと断言しましょう。私はあなたの敵ではなく、味方でありたい。そして、この思いはお互い共通のものだと思っています。それではまた、陛下」

languages.text: “我们是并肩作战的战友，我可以向您保证，您担心的事情绝对不会发生。我希望能成为您的盟友，而不是您的敌人，我也希望这种感觉是相互的。再见了，大人！”
languages.original_text: "I have seen you in action and I can assure you that black day will never come. I wish to be your ally, not your enemy, and I hope the feeling is mutual. Farewell, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: “我们是并肩作战的战友，我可以向您保证，您担心的事情绝对不会发生。我希望能成为您的盟友，而不是您的敌人，我也希望这种感觉是相互的。再见了，大人！”

languages.text: "Seni çatışmada izledim ve o karanlık günün asla gelmeyeceğine emin olabilirsin. Müttefikin olmak isterim, düşmanın değil. Umarım hislerimiz karşılıklıdır. Elveda {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!"
languages.original_text: "I have seen you in action and I can assure you that black day will never come. I wish to be your ally, not your enemy, and I hope the feeling is mutual. Farewell, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
